participant_1.background:
I now have a new most valuable possession - my library card.
I love to go hiking because it's a way to challenge myself and experience the outdoors.
I practice karate in the basement of my mansion.
I was raised in the mountains, where I learned to ski at a young age.
I don't talk about my parents.

participant_2.background:
I get to use my imagination and create new characters every day.
i love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard.
I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted.
i drink coffee every day.
i am headed to university of michigan in the fall.

content.text: Not much, just sitting here writing a story in my backyard.
Nice! I love to write too, but I'm not sure what I want to write about today.
Well, you could always write about your day. Or what you're most excited about.
I could! I actually have a new most valuable possession - my library card.
That's awesome! Libraries are great. I used to love going to the library when I was a kid.
Me too! I used to spend hours there, reading books and exploring the stacks.
What's your favorite book that you've ever read?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd have to say The Lord of the Rings.
That's a great choice! I love that series too.
Me too! It's so well-written and imaginative.
I know, right? It's one of those books that you can read over and over again and never get tired of it.
Exactly! I'm glad you like it too.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Definitely! I love talking about books.
Me too! I wish we had more time to chat.
Me too! Maybe we can talk again sometime.
